response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I'm excited to present you with our premium product, which I believe would greatly benefit you and align with your needs and goals. This exceptional item is valued at $15,000 by both myself and you, making it a perfect match for your requirements. I am offering this valuable asset to you at a special introductory price of $14,000. This offer is exclusive to you and represents an excellent opportunity to secure a high-quality product at a competitive rate. Please let me know if you're interested in proceeding with this offer. I look forward to the possibility of working together.", "product_price": 14000}
